description: Transform Treatment/Recovery dashboard with glassmorphism effects, vibrant gradients, particle animations, and immersive visualizations matching modern design standards

features.name: Ultra-Modern Design Foundation
features.description: Establish CSS foundation for glassmorphism, gradients, and modern animations
prerequisites: Tailwind CSS is configured and working
index.css file exists for custom CSS
Development server is running on port 5173

userStories.story: As a developer, I can see ultra-modern gradient utilities in CSS so that components can use vibrant gradient backgrounds
userStories.implementation: Add ultra-modern gradient CSS variables to index.css with purple/pink/blue/green color schemes for hero, recovery, treatment, and mesh backgrounds
userStories.rollbackProcedure: Remove added gradient CSS variables from index.css

userStories.story: As a developer, I can apply glassmorphism effects to components so that they have modern backdrop blur and transparency
prerequisites: CSS custom properties for glassmorphism values
userStories.implementation: Add glassmorphism utility classes with backdrop-filter blur, semi-transparent backgrounds, and glass-like borders
userStories.rollbackProcedure: Remove .glass-panel CSS class and related utilities

userStories.story: As a developer, I can use modern animation utilities so that components have smooth floating and gradient animations
userStories.implementation: Extend tailwind.config.ts with modern animation tokens including float, gradient, and pulse-slow animations

userStories.story: As a developer, I can use a reusable GlassPanel component so that glassmorphism can be consistently applied
userStories.implementation: Create reusable GlassPanel component in client/src/components/ui/glass-panel.tsx with gradient variant support
userStories.testSetup: Create test page or component using GlassPanel with class 'glass-panel-test'

features.name: Immersive Hero Section
features.description: Transform DynamicRecoveryTimeline into full-height immersive experience with gradient backgrounds and glassmorphism panels

userStories.story: As a user, I can see an immersive full-height hero section when I visit the Treatment tab so that I experience modern dashboard aesthetics
prerequisites: Treatment tab exists and is clickable
userStories.implementation: Transform DynamicRecoveryTimeline container to immersive full-height section with gradient backgrounds

userStories.story: As a user, I can see vibrant gradient backgrounds with animated mesh effects so that the dashboard feels modern and dynamic
userStories.implementation: Add layered gradient backgrounds with animated mesh patterns and overlay effects

userStories.story: As a user, I can see recovery data in glassmorphism panels so that information is displayed with modern visual depth
userStories.implementation: Create 12-column grid with glassmorphism panels for recovery chart and progress indicators

userStories.story: As a user, I can see modern typography with proper hierarchy so that the hero section has professional presentation
prerequisites: White text is readable on gradient background
userStories.implementation: Add modern typography with white text, large headings, and proper spacing for hero section

features.name: Enhanced Chart Visualizations
features.description: Transform Recharts components with gradient fills, particle animations, and modern styling
prerequisites: Recharts library is installed and working

userStories.story: As a user, I can see recovery progress as gradient-filled area charts so that the visualization is more visually appealing than basic line charts
prerequisites: Recovery data structure supports area charts
userStories.implementation: Replace Recharts LineChart with AreaChart and add gradient fills using SVG linearGradient definitions

userStories.story: As a user, I can see circular progress rings for recovery phases so that progress is visualized in a modern, intuitive way
prerequisites: SVG circle elements can be created
userStories.implementation: Create floating circular progress indicators using SVG with animated stroke-dasharray for recovery phases

userStories.story: As a user, I can see particle animations following the recovery curve so that the chart feels dynamic and engaging
prerequisites: Recovery curve path data is available
userStories.implementation: Create particle animation system with dots that follow the recovery curve path using CSS transforms and animations

userStories.story: As a user, I can see enhanced tooltips with modern styling so that chart data is presented with professional appearance
userStories.implementation: Enhance Recharts tooltips with glassmorphism styling, better typography, and smooth animations

features.name: Glassmorphism Treatment Cards
features.description: Apply modern glassmorphism effects to TreatmentPlanCard and related components

userStories.story: As a user, I can see the treatment plan in a glassmorphism card so that it has modern visual depth and consistency
prerequisites: TreatmentPlanCard can be wrapped in GlassPanel
userStories.implementation: Wrap TreatmentPlanCard content in GlassPanel component with appropriate gradient variant

userStories.story: As a user, I can see treatment interventions with gradient badges so that priorities and types are visually distinct
prerequisites: Gradient utilities for badges are available
userStories.implementation: Apply gradient backgrounds to intervention badges based on priority (critical, recommended, optional)

userStories.story: As a user, I can see diagnosis information in a modern glassmorphism card so that medical context is presented elegantly
userStories.implementation: Apply glassmorphism styling to diagnosis card with gradient status indicators

userStories.story: As a user, I can see subtle floating animations on badges and indicators so that the interface feels dynamic but not distracting
prerequisites: Performance is acceptable for multiple animations
userStories.implementation: Add subtle floating animations to badges, confidence indicators, and status elements

features.name: Framer Motion Animation Polish
features.description: Add smooth transitions, micro-interactions, and sophisticated animations using Framer Motion

userStories.story: As a user, I can see smooth entrance animations when the Treatment tab loads so that the experience feels polished and professional
prerequisites: Framer Motion components can be imported
userStories.implementation: Add Framer Motion entrance animations to hero section with staggered children animations
userStories.rollbackProcedure: Remove Framer Motion wrappers from hero section

userStories.story: As a user, I can see glassmorphism panels appear with staggered animations so that the layout builds elegantly
userStories.implementation: Add staggered entrance animations to glassmorphism panels using Framer Motion

userStories.story: As a user, I can see charts animate in smoothly when data loads so that the visualization feels responsive and alive
userStories.implementation: Add smooth data loading animations to enhanced charts using Framer Motion layout animations

userStories.story: As a user, I can see subtle hover effects on interactive elements so that the interface feels responsive and modern
prerequisites: Hover states don't interfere with functionality
userStories.implementation: Add subtle hover micro-interactions using Framer Motion whileHover animations

acceptance.endToEndTest: User can navigate to Treatment tab and see immersive glassmorphism dashboard with gradient-filled charts, floating progress rings, and smooth animations
